vulnerability_location.description: Public transfer function has no authorization checks (e.g., onlyOwner), allowing any caller to initiate token transfers via transferFrom.
Unchecked multiplication and exponentiation: computing _value = v * 10 ** _decimals in Solidity <0.8.0 can overflow without safemath checks
Low-level call caddress.call(...) return value is not checked, potentially causing silent failures

Unbounded loop performing external low-level calls (caddress.call) forwarding all remaining gas to untrusted contract, allowing a malicious token contract to consume all gas and block or revert the distribution
Use of low-level caddress.call to invoke transferFrom without checking the returned success flag, leading to silent failures
